nodes.text: The FD3-MN fighting droid, also called FD3 fighting droid, was a model of gladiator droid with a white cylindrical body. They possessed two arms which could be equipped with a circular saw. FD3-MN was a modified FD3 fighting droid that was made to fight in the droid arena of the Lodge on the planet Vandor. In 10 BBY, FD3-MN fought against the power droid WG-22 and destroyed it before preparing to face a FD4 fighting droid. The match was interrupted by the droid L3-37 who tried to convince the FD4 not to fight while the arena manager Ralakili shouted at her. FD3-LT was also a droid of this model.

A FD3-MN fighting droid first appeared in the 2018 Anthology Series film, Solo: A Star Wars Story. The droid was not named in the film, but was identified as an FD3 fighting droid in the video "Every Droid in Star Wars", which was posted on StarWarsKids.com in 2019.
